quote: I believe everything we go through in life is to be a part of your story.
why_clipworthy: It highlights the importance of perseverance and personal growth.
suggested_hook: How your life's challenges can become your greatest strengths.

quote: Think even bigger than you thought.
why_clipworthy: Encourages listeners to expand their vision and goals.
suggested_hook: Are you thinking big enough? Here's why you should aim higher.
